post.body: I've been watching HBO's John Adams' mini series while I run on the treadmill in the am. Great episodes--too long for multi-task w exercise.
Home after speaking @ our Student Ministries' World Aids' Day gathering. Spoke on sex. I'm sure I embarrased my JH & HS kid. Oh well...
Prepping a message for tonight's student ministry World Aids Night.
Cathy & I dominated in a late-night Bunco after church tonight. I don't know why they say it's a women's game...a few fights broke out.
So great having Torie home from college this long weekend. No one in the world makes me laugh like her. There's nothing like family!
This Thanksgiving I'm sure I gained 10 lbs... it's grieving weight since my friend Andy moved to Colorado--I think he moved-still in denial.
3 mtgs today about Refuel (my new book)...program mtg for weekend services, content mtg for sm grp material, & distribution mtg. Great crew!
I'm regretting loading up the day before Thanksgiving with meetings. How stupid am I? And, I can't cancel them... when will I learn?
College daughter home playing "Rock Band", wife has her sm grp over to bake cookies, son off to chemistry tutor, time for Volleyball w boys.
In 2 days I run annual Turkey Trot 10k. Every yr I say, "I need to get in shape before the race." Every yr I don't. I ran this am. Trouble
http://twitpic.com/nsuv - Watched 24 w 200 people after church... here is the promo slide they used. Jack looks good!
Want to upload a photo from 24 last night. Twitpic is giving me problems...what's another application that works?
Sitting @Round Table Pizza with family & Torie's college friends hearing hilarious story about them sneaking rats into college dorm room.
Woke up this am wishing I was in Nashville w some good friends. If you're @YS conf please go to Simply YM booth & "goose" Andy & get a prize
Pulling together a "Friday Night Special"...just found out that I'm pinch-hitting and preaching this weekend. 24 hour notice--plenty of time
Have got many Twits ab why i'm not @YS's NYWC. I planned to go to all 3 (as I have 15+ yrs) but l had to cancel 2 of them. I'm a BIG YS fan!
Best episode of Survivor I've seen! Then we followed with a very funny The Office. Since I don't watch much TV, those 2 shows bring me joy.
My wife & 13 year old daughter are crazy excited to see Twilight...i'd rather be biten by a vampire.
In a serious rewrite of PDYM. Late night writing sessions are key! Another chapter down, many more to go! It's been 10 yrs since updated.
Cleaned office @Saddleback & found a ltr (1 year old) asking 4 my help on something. Now it makes more sense why the family doesn't like me
2 podcasts today: marriage/YM w/ Cathy @ 12:15pst & YM w SYM gang @ 1pm. Watch live @ www.simplyinsider.com or on itunes later.
At the Life Hurts God Heals graduation... Amazing stories of hurting kids. It's pretty amazing stuff. Megan Hutchinson is an amazing leader!
Trying to finish weekend sermon prep on Wednesday because I've got too much to do the next 2 days. Email is a distraction. Twitter a delight
Just watched 2 videos on MSN.com on OJ Simpson's "sorry" and the Goldman's "glad he's going to jail"... the whole thing is so bizarre to me.
Reading new book "The Purpose of Xmas", prepping a xmas message for this weekend, listening to the Beatles (which of these does not belong?)
Preached 2 sermons and capped off with Chic-fil-a. Speaking a lot of adults lately & have missed teaching teenagers the last few weeks.
A Twitter clarifier: the ear piece is for my "home" office only. I will NEVER wear one outside. I've got grief all day. home=no one sees me.
I've made fun of phones that fit in your ear 4 so long that I feel stupid wearing one in my home office. I will never be seen outside w one
Out to dinner w my 8th grade daughter while Cathy was @ HS sm grp. She worked me over b/c she's the "only 8th grader" w/o a cell phone.
Sitting in a waiting room ready to have some skin cancer removed from my arm. I want a lolly pop or ice cream cone.
Making a form, pouring cement foundation & being Mr. Home Depot tomorrow. Scared & out of my comfort zone. Need to b done by 2 for UCLA game
Sitting in a meeting with SYM & Group--Andy is on a monitor (in Co.) and it feels like he is sitting next to me. Technology at its best!
Just got ambushed while coming out of the bathroom--the I.T. guys with dartguns. Thankfully I was behind @joshgriffin and he's a big shield.
I'm writing 3 video scripts to go with my new book "Refuel" and, I'm feeling a little empty right now. How's that for irony? Fill up time.
Was an audience for a missionary's photo presentation tonight. Now I understand why they do that... I wanted to pay him to stop.
Driving up to a meeting @ Rick Warren's house... it's either a Christmas bonus, I'm getting fired, or he needs me to pick up his backyard.
Gave out my first copy of Refuel to a restaurant owner. It's kind of cool to have a non-yth ministry book that I can give out to anyone.
Holding the first copy of REFUEL (my newest book)...hot off the press. It looks good... it's a unique size...makes it look easier to read.
Sitting @ Cody's Varsity football banquet. Great boys, great kids, lousy season.
Torie's 20th bday. 20!? So weird to be a parent of someone in their 20's. I think Cathy & I were 13&14 when we had her...what? It's possible
Great Survivor Season! The jury was nasty-perfect example of poor losers. I think Jeff Probst is really pretty (in a very male type of way)
Tonight is 1st night in 15 wks I haven't taught on a Sun. night. It's a nice break 2 see the service from a different, non-stage perspective
Very sore from day of pouring cement. I'm not in shoveling & wheelbarrow shape. I wasn't this sore after running a marathon (oh, yes i did).
At the UCLA bball game with @ McGill. I just won the bet where DePaul is located.
A buffet for breakfast & now a stop @ Rocky Mountain Chocolate...call Guiness Book of World Records--I may be the fattest human alive.
Day 3 ends in Lake Tahoe. Very cool place that is very cold. Drive to Mammoth Lakes tomorrow. Took the kids 2 the place Cathy & I first met.
Day 2 of vac. ends in Scotts' Valley. Hearsts' Castle sold out, lunch w friends @ Sea Shanty, "no" on S.F... detour to Cathy's best friend.
Day 2-sleep-in, work-out, watch fball, now start driving north. Hearsts' castle? San Fran...we'll see. But, regardless there will be food.
1st vacation stop--Pismo Beach. Staying in cool hotel, a lot of laughter, watching top music videos of yr (I'm changing the channel a lot).
Stared a family vacation today. We are driving north..no reservations. Left @ 5pm (our goal was to leave @ 1). 1st stop 7mi for chick-fil-a
Just finished speaking @ 9 & 11pm services. Normally the Fields' tradition is to do Dennys till 2am. New ownership, Dennys closes @ midnight
Went to buy Cathy a gift @ her favorite store. I have a $100 gift certificate because I'm cheap. It's out of business. I'm really cheap now.
Worked out 2 days in row to get a head start on new yrs diet. But, I just ate an entire box of Dots & a bag of Twizzlers. I'll wait till 1/1
I saw Jim Carrey's new movie "Yes Man"... it was okay... I think he should have said "No" and said "yes" to Ace Ventura Pet Detective 3.
Prep, shopping, 3 services @ church, Dennys w very fun friends, late night jacuzzi, family delivering backpacks to homeless in LA. Full day.
Just watched a ''Christmas movie'' with the older girls-Coyote Ugly. Should be titled ''stupid & ugly & a waste of time.'' No animals at all
Wrapping gifts for our trip to the streets tomorrow where we give Christmas backpacks to the homeless in LA.
Family Christmas photos in front of HUGE tree @ Fashion Island (Newport Beach)--where the price of a t-shirt is $100. Visit but don't buy.
Sitting in traffic hearing 6 college age girls talking about post-final pranks that include pooping in a bag. My money @ work.
Re: Rick Warren @ Obama's inauguration. Rick is getting heat from liberals & conservatives. This heat would melt me. Rick doesn't flinch.
